entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:38 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:38 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:38 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
